name: Crossy Crazy Road
description:
Crossy Crazy Road - Never Ending
Crossy Crazy Road - Never Ending is an Endless running, jumping and crossing crazy road game
Game is all about saving the animal from rolling drums, turtles, rolling blades, bullets, arrows and reach its destination.
- Crossy Crazy Road is a new 3D adventure game and arcade game

Crossy Crazy Road is an road crossing game in which you are trying to fill belly with yummy coins which are loacted in the streets ,during coin collection you should be aware of ongoing traffic.
As the traffic is too heavy so please take care of traffic and other obstacles when crossing the road.
Several Obstacles You will face:
Arrow obstacle
Fire Ball
Tortoise
Big Wheels
and Many other amazing things as obstacles.
Features :
- Easy, interesting, and new
- Fun crossing road game.
- Get coins for extra points.

How to play Crossy Crazy Road :
- Jump on lane by lane by tapping on the screen anywhere.
- Avoid hitting from obstacles as much time as you can. Its that simple.
- When you collects some good amount coin then you can buy other characters for game .
It will be too much fun in this.
Crossy Crazy Road - Its flashy, addictive, challenging, refreshing, adventurous, Colorful, Fun.
